field_options.description: Not required until feature request gets approved.

rows.field_308957: Users can enable the light or dark theme when using the product.
The product has been adapted to fit the Ipad screen size and be functional on the IPad.
The product can integrate with the data from Facebook Campaigns.
Users have more options to select when they want to be notified.

rows.field_308709: Points with streaks for daily log-ins
rows.field_308957: Users get daily points which can add up to certain privileges or prizes when they log in daily.

rows.field_308709: User can pay using American Express
rows.field_308957: Users now have the capability of making in-app purchases using American Express as a primary method of payment.

rows.field_308709: Users are able to share a post privately
rows.field_308957: Users are able to share a post or an achievement with their friends, without their friends seeing any identifying info about the user's account.

rows.field_308709: More options to share links through.
rows.field_308957: Users can send links automatically through more platforms.

rows.field_308709: An additional database added as a source
rows.field_308957: A new database that can handle more memory intensive data has been added to the back end of the product.

rows.field_308709: Added a CDN to cache frequent requests
rows.field_308957: A CDN was enabled, allowing data to be retrieved faster if the user is located near a CDN instead of them waiting to get a response from the source DB.

rows.field_308709: Users are incentivized with points to send out a share link.
rows.field_308957: Users are offered 10 points if they share their account link to their friends or family.

rows.field_308709: Dashboards are produced based off of points and their usage.
rows.field_308957: Dashboards are produced using a new software program that tracks the accumulation and spending of those points.

rows.field_308709: Users get 100 points if they import their contacts.
rows.field_308957: Users are awared 100 points if they import their contacts into the app.

rows.field_308709: An unknown error bug is fixed.
rows.field_308957: Users are no longer shown an "unknown error 593" message when the app can't fetch the metadata

rows.field_308709: Users are recommended other users that they may know.
rows.field_308957: Users are sent recommendations about other users they may be familiar with.
Users are able to toggle a setting that increases the font size throughout the app entirely.
Users can use Bitmojis when interacting with their friends.

rows.field_308734: Responsible for front-end user interface issues.
